reviewText: very good movie for children and adults alike. I recommend it to one and all. Was enjoyable and funny at times
Title: The Adventures of Tom Sawyer by DVDBookshelf

reviewText: See what our Grandparents enjoyed as children. This is the classic Black and White film from producer David O. Selznick starring  Tom Kelly and a young Walter Brennan. Enjoy the book and then be sure to enjoy this fine movie. Never went out of date. Viewing for all ages for all ages!Comes bundled with 2 other Kids and family movies Buy and enjoy
Title: The Adventures of Tom Sawyer by DVDBookshelf

reviewText: I liked this very much the characters of Tom, Huck, Sydney were all well portrayed and especially enjoyed Walter Brennan at a younger age than he was in the Real McCoys and The One and Only Original Family Band.
summary: Adventures of Tom Sawyer Walter Brennan
Title: The Adventures of Tom Sawyer by DVDBookshelf

reviewText: I've titled this another Sawyer Movie because for me that's all it is. I have tried to collect movies based on Twain's characters and this is simply another of those. It's OK. Some are much worse and some immensely better.
Title: The Adventures of Tom Sawyer by DVDBookshelf

reviewText: The best Tom Sawyer I've ever seen. It is also fun to see a young Walter Brennan...seems like he was always old.I have not watched the additional movies on this disc.
summary: This is a really good Tom Sawyer
Title: The Adventures of Tom Sawyer by DVDBookshelf

reviewText: This is yet another movie I purchased based on my recollections of seeing it on morning tv as a youngster.  The years slipped away and I was transported back to my original viewing - the cave scenes still send a chill and the fun is still there as Tom and Huck live their lives by the river. This movie will stay in my collection until I die.
summary: Another movie from my Saturday morning tv
Title: The Adventures of Tom Sawyer by DVDBookshelf

reviewText: This is the story as told by Hollywood back when they were capable of making good movies without using special effects.  Very enjoyable.
Title: The Adventures of Tom Sawyer by DVDBookshelf

reviewText: A classic with extras so you cannot beat the deal , extra family entertainment, a full evening of fun for everyone.
Title: The Adventures of Tom Sawyer by DVDBookshelf
